chapters.title: Chapter 20: The Golden Crane
chapters.info: Donalo Sandomere, p. 428—Dedicated with a creased farmer's face and a sharply trimmed, oiled beard. He works closely with Logain. He wears a large garnet in his left ear. He has bonded Ayako Norsoni with the “wife bond.” See also Norsoni, Ayako.
